animeTitle: Ano Hi no Kokoro wo Toraete
animeDescription: The story is set in a town that preserves nature and its natural attractions using technology. It centers on a protagonist who has drifted apart from his childhood friend, and uses the FlatFormer to reconnect through time and space.   (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Kyougoku Takahiko', ['Director', 'Script']], ['Uki Atsuya', ['Original Character Design']], ['Nakamura Hideki', ['Art Director']], ['Mikasa Osamu', ['Color Setting', 'Color Design']]]
